# Ignore node_modules
node_modules/

# Ignore environment variables
.env

# Ignore Firebase private key JSON file
firebase-adminsdk.json

# Ignore build outputs
bin/
obj/

# Ignore user-specific files
*.swp
*.swo
*.sln.docstates
.vscode/
.idea/
*.user
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.userprefs

# Ignore logs
*.log

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
*.bak
*.old

# Ignore compiled files
*.dll
*.exe
*.so
*.dylib
*.class

# Ignore OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore Rider project files
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Ignore Visual Studio Code settings
.vscode/

# Ignore JetBrains Rider settings
.idea/

# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
# build logs
*.ncb
*.sdf
*.opensdf
*.vcxproj.user
*.code-workspace

# Ignore ASP.NET Core secrets
secrets.json

# Ignore other sensitive files
secrets/

# Specific path to ignore
obj/Release/net6.0/PubTmp/Out/Secrets/serviceAccountKey.json
